```{r 2021 draft}
stats_2020_d21 <- read.csv("data/2020stats_2021draft.csv")
stats_2019_d21 <- read.csv("data/2019stats_2021draft.csv")
stats_2018_d21 <- read.csv("data/2018stats_2021draft.csv")
stats_2017_d21 <- read.csv("data/2017stats_2021draft.csv")
stats_2016_d21 <- read.csv("data/2016stats_2021draft.csv")
draft_2021_pff <- left_join(stats_2020_d21, stats_2019_d21, by = c("player_id", "player", "position", "team_name"), suffix = c(".final", ".2ndlast"))
head(draft_2021_pff, 10)
```
